The Global Credit Crunch – Implications for Investment Strategy by Stephen J Cucchiaro, President and Founder of Windward Investment Management, Inc.

Stephen Cucchiaro returns! One of our most popular talks was given in May 2007 by Mr Cucchiaro. At that time we were treated to a dynamic description of worldwide market risks. He is a pioneer in the use of ETFs to reduce risk. Stephen Cucchiaro is the only talk on the agenda.

Mr. Cucchiaro will:
  • Review the global dynamics that led to our current market conditions, paying particular attention to the forces driving the global credit crunch.
  • Explore the impact that a global credit contraction has on a wide variety of global market indices and asset classes.
  • Discuss how one may formulate an investment strategy that deals with the special risks presented by a global credit contraction.



Bio of Stephen J Cucchiaro

Stephen Cucchiaro is president and founder of Windward Investment Management, Inc. with overall responsibility for investment performance.

Mr. Cucchiaro has conducted over 30 years of research on the global capital markets. He earned a BS in Mathematics at M.I.T. in 1974 and an MBA in Finance at Wharton in 1977, where he was the top student in his graduating class in Investments and Corporate Finance courses. Upon graduation, Mr. Cucchiaro held positions in management consulting with Coopers & Lybrand, Data Resources (as senior economist) and CSP International (now part of Booz-Allen & Hamilton) as managing director of strategy consulting. In 1984, he became president and co-founder of Datext, Inc., which was successfully sold to Lotus Development Corporation in 1987. As general manager at Lotus, his group was responsible for the commercial introduction of Lotus Notes. Subsequently, as president of ICAD, Inc, he helped position this engineering automation software provider for IPO and subsequent sale to Oracle Corporation. In 1990, Mr. Cucchiaro launched his Model of the global capital markets, became an SEC-registered investment advisor and organized the corporation now known as Windward Investment Management, Inc.

During the late 1970’s, Mr. Cucchiaro qualified for the U.S. Olympic Team in yacht racing and became national champion of his class in 1978 and Gold Medalist in the 1979 Pan American Olympic Games.
